title: What do you think, and why?
content:
This is through my kcet rank. 
So what do you guys think will be better for future placements or even higher studies?

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/14aqsog)

comments.body: If you're planning higher studies, then it's best to do it in a field similar to the field you want to pursue your Masters in. The programmes need to be the same, or similar. So keeping that in mind, what's your preferred branch among these? If it's ECE, pick PES (assuming you are getting PES via CET), else pick the one you have.
Dsce cs isn't bad- and don't take ece without knowing his hard it is. You'll have a lot more free time with cse
